Content: The app used to have a clear UI to present hourly information. Now, the new presentation of hourly information doesn't clearly display the segments of time, is sluggish and annoying to scroll sideways through, and you can't scroll from the menu of detailed information that appears when you tap on one hour to the next hour. There is the option to use the list view, but it defaults to the graph. Even the new list is clunkier and more sluggish than it used to be.
App Name: AccuWeather: Weather Alerts & Live Storm Radar
Strongest Sub-Dimension Definition: The app is ease to use, accessible, and respond quickly when the users interacts with it.
